= Vim Customisations =

== General ==

\s      | Toggle Spell Check
\k      | Run rake
\m      | Run mix tests
<C-C>   | Close window
<C-N>   | Vsplit
<C-P>   | File finder
gcip    | Comment Paragraph

== Movement ==

<C-h>   | Move left one pane
<C-j>   | Move down one pane
<C-k>   | Move up one pane
<C-l>   | Move right one pane

== Git ==

\gs     | Git Status
\gb     | Git Blame
\gr     | Git Grep

== Rails ==

gf      | Goto File
\rm     | Goto Model
\rv     | Goto View
\rc     | Goto Controller
\rt     | Start Rails console
\rs     | Start Rails server
\rx     | Extract current selection to partial
\rgc    | Generate controller
\rgm    | Generate model
\rgg    | Generate migration
\rgj    | Generate job
